price: (Ɛda a) wͻde ntεmpε na εbεkͻ wͻn anim a wͻ atwetwe wͻn kͻn, na wͻn ti apagya hwε soro, na wͻn ani nnane mma wͻn hͻ, na wͻn akoma (mu) bεyε hwee (anaasε hwee nni wͻn akoma mu) no.
arabic: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna muq'niʿī ruūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawāon
